title: Pixel 3 ear piece stops working
content:
I have a pixel 3 and the earpiece has stopped working. This is the third replacement phone I have had. It is also the first refurbished phone I have had. Why does this issue keep happening?

It is literally the speaker. YouTube only plays out of one speaker now, as well as music. I have to talk through speakerphone. 

How come no one is talking about this?
